channel.title: Resources on Enchantment in the History of Capitalism
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Enchantment in the History of Capitalism

item.title: An interview with Will Pooley
item.description: Will Pooley is a Senior Lecturer in Modern History at the University of Bristol. Transcript 00:00:00 Kristof Welcome, everyone, to an episode of the summer podcast of the Research Network Enchantment in the History of Capitalism. We’re a very interdisciplinary group of scholars that get together to explore the different ways enchantment can be a methodological tool, conceptual structure, or a driving force one way or other in histories of capitalism and in the past month.
